org.anyframe.flex.query.dao
Class FlexDao

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.flex.query.dao.FlexDao

public class FlexDao
extends java.lang.Object

This interface help to use anyframe.core.flex.query.FlexService more easy. this interface is including method to select, insert, update, delete, and save to database using DataSet.

Author:
Jonghoon Kim

queryId - query id to execute in query mapping file.

pageSize - row size a page

batchExecute

public int batchExecute(java.lang.String queryId,
                        DataSet dataSet,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> param)
                 throws org.anyframe.query.exception.QueryException
execute batch operation for given queryId.

Parameters:
queryId - query id to execute in query mapping file.
dataSet - DataSet
param - Map contains search conditions.
Returns:
total count of executed query operation.
Throws:
org.anyframe.query.exception.QueryException

saveAll

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> saveAll(DataSet dataSet,
                                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> param)
                                                          throws org.anyframe.query.exception.QueryException
This is the method for inserting, updating and deleting using DataSet.

Parameters:
dataSet - DataSet object including query id.
param - param including query condition.
Returns:
Map including result count for each queryId.
Throws:
org.anyframe.query.exception.QueryException - if there is any problem executing the query
